### getMachineOpValue() {#af4a1a1b8458cb5d562bdeb5dfdbe7ba0}

Return binary encoding of operand.

If the machine operand requires relocation, record the relocation and return zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvmccodeemitter-cpp/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvmccodeemitter-cpp">RISCVMCCodeEmitter.cpp</a>.
